statements: SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT expense_date, project_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE project_name LIKE 'Marketing%' ORDER BY expense_amount ASC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT DISTINCT category, COUNT(*) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Office Supplies' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, SUM(expense_amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_name, expense_date FROM expenses WHERE category = 'Travel' ORDER BY expense_date ASC, expense_amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000 AND category != 'Food' ORDER BY expense_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT category, AVG(expense_amount) AS avg_expense FROM expenses GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(expense_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, expense_date, expense_description FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT amount, expense_description FROM expenses WHERE amount BETWEEN 100.00 AND 500.00;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, budget FROM projects ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY expense_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE budget < 5000 ORDER BY project_id;

SELECT project_name, project_manager, budget, COUNT(expense_id) AS expense_count FROM projects LEFT JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name, project_manager, budget HAVING expense_count > 3;
SELECT expense_description, amount, project_name FROM expenses INNER JOIN projects ON expenses.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects LEFT JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT expense_id, amount, date FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT collaborator_name, role FROM collaborators WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT project_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC, expense_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe' ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT expense_id, amount, description FROM expenses JOIN projects ON expenses.project_id = projects.project_id WHERE project_manager = 'Alice Smith' AND role = 'Developer' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT project_name, collaborator_name, role FROM projects JOIN collaborators ON projects.project_id = collaborators.project_id WHERE project_name LIKE 'Marketing%' ORDER BY collaborator_name;

SELECT project_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM expenses JOIN projects ON expenses.project_id = projects.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_expenses > 5000 ORDER BY total_expenses DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT project_id, description, amount FROM expenses WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT collaborator_name, email FROM collaborators WHERE collaborator_id = 2;
SELECT project_id, expense_id FROM project_expenses WHERE project_id = 3 ORDER BY expense_id ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT collaborator_name, email, phone_number FROM collaborators
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT collaborator_name, phone_number FROM collaborators WHERE email LIKE '%example.com%'
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT project_name, project_start_date, project_end_date FROM projects;
SELECT collaborator_name, collaborator_email FROM collaborators WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT collaborator_name, expense_amount FROM collaborators JOIN collaborator_expenses ON collaborators.collaborator_id = collaborator_expenses.collaborator_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT project_name, project_description, project_start_date FROM projects ORDER BY project_start_date DESC;
SELECT collaborator_name, collaborator_email FROM collaborators WHERE collaborator_id = 1;
SELECT expense_description, expense_amount FROM expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;

SELECT project_name, collaborator_name, expense_amount FROM projects p INNER JOIN collaborators c ON p.project_id = c.project_id INNER JOIN project_expenses pe ON p.project_id = pe.project_id INNER JOIN collaborator_expenses ce ON c.collaborator_id = ce.collaborator_id WHERE pe.expense_id = ce.expense_id;
